title: My WiFi is no longer functional on my Google pixel 4 after the latest update.
content:
Saw the latest Google update on Friday (10/16) and after that my pixel 4 is no longer connecting to wifi.

I've tried all options including 1) restarting my router, 2) restarting my phone, 3) removing my WiFi credentials and reenter them. None of my other devices have any issues as they are connecting and working fine. I'm 100% sure this issue is related to the latest update as I'd not seen this WiFi issue prior to that and my phone was connecting fine to my router.

Has anyone else seen this?

Release I've on my phone is: RP1A.201005.004

Android 11 release

Thanks!
